alt: Image featuring the world ended yesterday cover
title: The World Ended Yesterday
paragraph: You know what we need, Hobbes? We need an attitude. Yeah, you can't be cool if you don't have an attitude.

title: The Impossible Astronaut
paragraph: Sometimes the surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that none of it has tried to contact us.

alt: Image featuring the world ended yesterday cover
title: Down with this sort of thing
paragraph: I don't need to compromise my principles, because they don't have the slightest bearing on what happens to me anyway.
